author: Team Latestly
title: Delhi Weather Update: Sudden Dust and Thunderstorms Hit Delhi and NCR, Forecast of Gusty Winds With Speed of 50-70 Kmph by IMD | ğŸ“° LatestLY
text: A major dust storm hit Delhi-NCR on Friday evening with residents reporting power outage in their areas. Residents shared videos of sudden dust storm and thunderstorm slamming several parts of Delhi-NCR. In its weather forecast, the India Meteorological Department or IMD has also predicted dust storm with rain and gusty winds with speed of 50-70 Km/hour over and adjoining areas of entire Delhi and NCR including Ghaziabad, Noida and Gurugram. Delhi Weather Update: National Capital Records 14.7 Degrees Celsius As Minimum Temperature, AQI in â€˜Poorâ€™ Category.
